statements: SELECT concert_id, concert_name, ticket_price, available_seats FROM concert_tickets WHERE concert_id = 1;
SELECT concert_name, available_seats FROM concert_tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM concert_tickets WHERE available_seats > 100 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT concert_name FROM concert_tickets WHERE ticket_price < 30 ORDER BY concert_name ASC;
SELECT ticket_price, available_seats FROM concert_tickets WHERE concert_name LIKE '%rock%' ORDER BY available_seats DESC;
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price FROM concert_tickets WHERE available_seats > 0;
SELECT * FROM concert_tickets WHERE ticket_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY concert_name ASC;
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price FROM concert_tickets ORDER BY ticket_price DESC, concert_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_concerts, SUM(available_seats) AS total_seats FROM concert_tickets;
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price, available_seats FROM concert_tickets WHERE available_seats < 100 ORDER BY available_seats DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_prices WHERE price > 50
SELECT concert_id, ticket_type FROM ticket_prices WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP' ORDER BY concert_id ASC
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM ticket_prices
SELECT section_id, COUNT(*) AS number_of_seats FROM seating_arrangements GROUP BY section_id
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangements WHERE is_occupied = false ORDER BY concert_id DESC
SELECT concert_id, ticket_type, price FROM ticket_prices WHERE concert_id = 12345
SELECT ticket_type, price, concert_id FROM ticket_prices WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangements WHERE section_id = 100 ORDER BY seat_number ASC
SELECT concert_id, COUNT(*) AS total_seats FROM seating_arrangements GROUP BY concert_id
SELECT ticket_type, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM ticket_prices GROUP BY ticket_type HAVING AVG(price) > 50 ORDER BY average_price DESC
SELECT * FROM concerts ORDER BY concert_name DESC;
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price FROM concerts WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, sale_date FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY sale_date;
SELECT concert_id, COUNT(arrangement_id) AS total_seats FROM seating_arrangements GROUP BY concert_id;
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price, sale_date FROM concerts JOIN ticket_sales ON concerts.concert_id = ticket_sales.concert_id;
SELECT * FROM concerts ORDER BY concert_date DESC, ticket_price ASC
SELECT concert_name, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets_sold FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY concert_name

SELECT concert_name, seat_row, seat_number FROM concerts JOIN seating_arrangements ON concerts.concert_id = seating_arrangements.concert_id WHERE seating_arrangements.is_available = TRUE ORDER BY seat_row, seat_number
SELECT customer_name, sale_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY sale_date DESC

SELECT ticket_sales.sale_id, concerts.concert_name, seating_arrangements.seat_row, seating_arrangements.seat_number FROM ticket_sales JOIN concerts ON ticket_sales.concert_id = concerts.concert_id JOIN seating_arrangements ON ticket_sales.arrangement_id = seating_arrangements.arrangement_id WHERE seating_arrangements.is_available = TRUE AND ticket_sales.customer_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM ticket_prices LIMIT 10;
SELECT concert_name, price FROM ticket_prices WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangements ORDER BY section ASC, row DESC;
SELECT concert_name, event_date, venue FROM concerts WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM venues WHERE capacity >= 1000;
SELECT concert_name, price FROM ticket_prices WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY concert_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT section, row, seat_number FROM seating_arrangements WHERE seat_id BETWEEN 100 AND 150 ORDER BY row ASC, seat_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM concerts WHERE genre = 'Rock' AND venue = 'Madison Square Garden' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM venues WHERE capacity >= 5000 ORDER BY venue_name ASC;
SELECT concert_name, price FROM ticket_prices WHERE price < 100 AND concert_name LIKE '%Concert%' ORDER BY price DESC, concert_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM concert ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, artist_name, venue FROM concerts WHERE venue='Madison Square Garden';
SELECT section, price FROM ticket_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangements WHERE is_reserved = false ORDER BY section, seat_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT artist_name, venue, date FROM concerts WHERE artist_name LIKE 'R%' AND date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT section, seat_number FROM seating_arrangements WHERE is_reserved = TRUE ORDER BY section, seat_number ASC;
SELECT name AS venue_name, location FROM venues WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY name;
SELECT A.artist_name, V.name AS venue_name, C.date FROM artists A INNER JOIN concerts C ON A.id = C.id INNER JOIN venues V ON C.venue = V.id ORDER BY A.artist_name, C.date DESC;
